about_the_game:
PACT is an open-source tool that allows you to run different programs in different cores of your CPU automagically.


Here is a quick list of it's current features:
  • Automatically assign processes to threads/cores set by you.
  • Automatically detect games launched by Steam and others.
  • Minimize to System Tray (Windows).
  • Show you a basic overview of your system load.
  • Backup, Export, Import your configurations.

PACT is ready to go in three easy steps:
  • You pick your default cores where most of your programs will run.
  • You pick your high-performance cores where you want your high-performance programs to run.
  • You designate programs or let PACT do it automatically for Steam games and other launchers.

For special occasions you can choose to tag some program as "Custom Performance" with a configuration just for that program, exempt from the High Performance and Default configurations.

There is also a blacklist option, to ignore processes that don't play nice with PACT.

Software by the people, for the people.


PACT is open-source and the community is welcome to make suggestions, file for bugs or contribute to the project.
You can visit the website on the side, that will take you to the repository of the project.

Disclaimers:


PACT is a powerful tool that does not limit you.
It allows you to set priorities and affinities as you will.
If configured wrong, it can lead to worse performance, use it's advanced features with caution.

PACT offers performance gains by automating things already present on your system, primarily the process priority and affinity controls found in the task manager.

Processes that run at the SYSTEM level or KERNEL level may or may not be accessible to PACT, this can include Easy Anti Cheat.

PACT is an open-source tool that allows you to run different programs in different cores of your CPU automagically.

For special occasions you can choose to tag some program as "Custom Performance" with a configuration just for that program, exempt from the High Performance and Default configurations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 Threads/Cores or more
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have a GUI, you can run this.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: Config Files are stored in the base directory, along with backups, so total disk usage may vary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 4 Threads/Cores or more
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have a GUI, you can run this.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: Config Files are stored in the base directory, along with backups, so total disk usage may vary.

short_description: PACT is a tool that allows you to section different programs in to different cores/threads on your CPU automagically.
